themes: lack of sufficient city financial support
need for development and grant writing assistance
key_phrases: have not been able to grow sustainably
hire additional staff or even pay a livable wage
many orgs, who often employ one staff member who must wear multiple hats
including fundraising and donor development as well as program administration
if the city is unable to financially support these orgs then perhaps they could employ contracted development and grant writing teams
barriers_identified: inability to pay a livable wage
staff required to perform multiple roles
solutions_proposed: city could employ contracted development and grant writing teams to assist organizations
